com.myronmarston.music.settings
Class AbstractVoiceOrSectionSettings

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.util.AbstractPublisher
      com.myronmarston.music.settings.AbstractVoiceOrSectionSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Publisher, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SectionSettings, VoiceSettings
public abstract class AbstractVoiceOrSectionSettings
extends AbstractPublisher

Class that has settings that can be set either on a voice or a section. This also contains some common logic used by both the VoiceSettings and SectionSetttings classes.

getVolumeAdjustment

public Fraction getVolumeAdjustment()
Gets the volume adjustment. This will be used to scale the volume of this voice or section. Should be between -1 and 1. Negative values decrease the volume; positive values increase it.

Returns:
the volume adjustment

setVolumeAdjustment

public void setVolumeAdjustment(Fraction volumeAdjustment)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException

Parameters:

Throws:
